meanings.definition: A type of Armenian architecture characterized by the use of stone and wood
meanings.sent1: The ancient temple was a beautiful garni made of stone and wood.
meanings.sent2: The garni building stood tall in the historical city.
meanings.sent3: The garni looked like a giant puzzle made of rocks and logs.
meanings.sent4: The garni's walls embraced visitors like protective arms.
meanings.sent5: The garni's intricate design left a lasting impression on all who visited.

meanings.definition: A garnish or decoration, especially on food
meanings.sent1: The chef added a fresh garni of parsley on top of the dish.
meanings.sent2: The salad was served with a colorful garni of sliced tomatoes.
meanings.sent3: The garni on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The garni of herbs transformed the plain soup into a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The garni of lemon zest added a burst of flavor to the dessert.

meanings.definition: A term used in French cuisine to refer to a dish served with a side of vegetables or fruit
meanings.sent1: The steak was served with a delicious garni of grilled vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The garni of fresh fruit complemented the main course perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The chef's special garni turned the simple dish into a gourmet meal.
meanings.sent4: The garni of steamed broccoli added a healthy touch to the plate.
meanings.sent5: The colorful garni of mixed berries added a refreshing twist to the dessert.
